exceptions.exn: The reference sc was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold sc in *. destruct sc_R_1 as [Hpos Hsc]. apply g_app_inv in Hpos as [L [R [Hapi [Hl Hr]]]]. apply g_app_inv in Hapi as [LL [RR [HapiL [HLP HR]]]]. subst. simpl. rewrite app_nil_r. apply g_subcode in Hsc. apply subcode_g in Hsc as [ρ' [Hsc ρ'eq]]. subst. simpl. rewrite app_nil_r. apply g_subcode in Hsc. apply subcode_g in Hsc as [ρ'' [Hsc ρ''eq]]. subst. simpl. rewrite app_nil_r. unfold sc. simpl. split; auto.
